## Taxonomy
- **Class:** Aves
- **Order:** Passeriformes
- **Family:** Turdidae

## Occurrence at DeLuca Preserve
Confirmed in 2025 UF DeLuca BioBlitz (Research Grade)

## Conservation & rarity context
- IUCN: Least Concern; Florida: not listed; fairly common
- **Rarity note:** Frequent breeder in pastures and open woodlands

## Natural history notes
Nest cavity nester; uses nest boxes; eats insects and berries.
